basics.name: Gunnar Larsen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

work.summary: Conducting a research project evaluating how LLM's can be used for automated code review
highlights: Fine-tuning LLMs to be used for automated code reviews of data science projects
Analyzing qualitative and quantitative feedback from experienced developers on LLM-generated code, then presenting findings at UROP symposium

work.company: UH Department of Tropical Soil Sciences
work.summary: Collaborated in a team researching maize seedlings under varying environmental conditions
highlights: Collected experimental data and analyzed it using r and sci-kit learn to develop machine-learning models (SVM, Random Forest, CNN) and conducted statistical analysis for optimal seed selection in diverse environments

Worked on and presented multiple posters at the SURE summer symposium, finding significant growth differences between genotypes under drought conditions; peer-reviewed journal publication in preparation
Constructed a data dashboard that can be used to automate hyper-parameter tuning for similar datasets, enabling people with different backgrounds to utilize machine learning

work.summary: Teaching surf lessons to people of all ages
highlights: Teach surfing techniques and safety to beginners, building strong communication and leadership skills
Manage groups of students, ensuring safety and high-quality customer service while maintaining an engaging learning environment

awards.title: Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen based off their high school GPA

awards.title: UROP Project Grant
awards.summary: I was awarded a grant to help me complete my research project on LLM's for automated code review
